title: EP 72 : In Conversation with Jake Richards | dHEDGE
description:
EP 72 : In Conversation with Jake Richards | dHEDGE

In this episode Lisa and Jake talk about the idea behind dHedge, how dHedge functions and what problems dHedge is trying to solve. 


Timestamps for Convenience :

0:00 - Intro

03:25 - What problems are dHedge trying to solve?

05:00 - How does dHedge explain risks?

06:59 - How does dHedge define the market?

12:54 - What are the most commonly used strategies by managers?

14:54 - Risks of having everything on chain

18:44 - Risk of Strategies being public

20:49 - Manual Strategies at dHedge

22:57 - dHedge's Uniswap Integration

29:04 - The DHT Token

46:27 - Conclusion


Please consider donating to help fund these educational videos: 0x6da9AAa73D39F3880119Fd20e6d6a2f65Dd44ABe
